Package dev.robocode.tankroyale.botapi.graphics

Class SvgGraphics

  • Object
    • SvgGraphics
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGraphics
    public class SvgGraphics
extends Object
implements IGraphics
    Implementation of IGraphics that generates SVG markup.
